form.description: The id of the form that the switch belongs to

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  input: string
  control: string
  label: string
  thumb: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the switch. Useful for composition.

invalid.description: If `true`, the switch is marked as invalid.

label.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

name.description:
The name of the input field in a switch
(Useful for form submission).

onCheckedChange.description: Function to call when the switch is clicked.

required.description: If `true`, the switch input is marked as required,

value.description: The value of switch input. Useful for form submission.
